追究警方濫權違反人權法 ！
永不原諒黑警所作所為！！

聯合國人權事務高級專員巴切萊特（Michelle Bachelet）係6月已經留意到香港人權問題亦在8月13日發表聲明，指有確切證據證明警方違反指引，促請港府徹查。
http://www.thestandard.com.hk/breaking-news.php?id=132940&sid=4

所以我地開左另一戰線 - 唔講政治淨係跟國際指引講警察濫權！

8月30日 小弟已經寄出左一份49頁既懶人包去UNHRC 為佢地提供有用既資訊
當中包括 證據證明警隊如何違反國際指引同香港警察通例 同埋 解釋監警會係完全無監管作用

9月4日 小弟再寄出831太子事件資料 證明警隊阻止救護員作緊急救護等

雖然唔知有無用 但我地略盡綿力 咩都試下！

而家希望大家幫幫手
將呢個email寄去 UNHRC 求求佢出下聲

————————————————————
To:
infodesk@ohchr.org (General inquiries) OR
CP@ohchr.org (Complaint Procedure Unit)

Subject:
Human rights issues in HK


Dear OHCHR & UNHRC,
 
We refer to the email “Police brutality threatening human rights in Hong Kong” sent to OHCHR on 30 August and 4 September. We are writing to seek help and ask for independent investigation from your organization. 
 
Police brutality, especially in 721 Yuen Long incident and 831 Prince Edward incident, clearly shows that Hong Kong Police Force (“HKPF”) violated the following human rights, including but not limited to: 
1. Human Rights Standards and Practice for the Police
2. Freedom from Torture 
3. Freedom of Press 
4. Freedom of Health Care 
 
As mentioned in the documentation sent to you on 30 August, we, as helpless and powerless Hong Kong citizens, found no alternate solution or way to escalate this issue to local authority as our government turned a blind eye on police brutality and claimed HKPF is “enforcing the law”. 
 
Hong Kong has never suffered from such human rights threats, suppression to right of freedom and white terror from the government authority before. 
 
Hong Kong is not China; Not yet - as we still have our freedom of speech and expression as of today. 
 
If Hong Kong failed today, all our human rights and right to freedom would be completely suppressed by the government. 
 
Please help!!!
 
 
Regards,
 
XXXXXXXXXX
 
a Hong Kong citizen
